commit.systemPrompt:
Follow these rules for commit type/scope:
1. If changed files are outside src/, use 'docs:' for documentation files, otherwise use 'chore:' (no scope)
2. If changes are related to commit command, use scope 'commit' (e.g., 'feat(commit):', 'fix(commit):')
3. If changes are related to run command, use scope 'run' (e.g., 'feat(run):', 'fix(run):')
